ajxpdriver.name: fs
ajxpdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File System (Standard)]
ajxpdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[The most standard access to a filesystem located on the server.]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Path]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Absolute path to the folder on the server. You can use PYDIO_DATA_PATH and PYDIO_INSTALL_PATH to point to Pydio default data path and root install path.]

param.name: CREATE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Create]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Create folder if it does not exists]

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Creation Mask]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.]

param.name: PURGE_AFTER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Purge Days (Hard limit)]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Option to purge documents after a given number of days (even if shared). This require a manual set up of a CRON task. Leave to 0 if you don't wan't to use this feature.]

param.name: PURGE_AFTER_SOFT
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Purge Days (Soft limit)]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Option to purge documents after a given number of days (if not shared). This require a manual set up of a CRON task. Leave to 0 if you don't wan't to use this feature.]

param.name: DATA_TEMPLATE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Data template]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to a directory on the filesystem whose content will be copied to the repository the first time it is loaded.]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_METASOURCES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Metasources]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all repositories created with this driver]
